title: Water treatment
description: Ozone is the most effective and eco-friendly water treatment method. 95% of drinking water in Europe is treated with ozone. It does not form dangerous byproducts like chlorine.

drinking-water.title: Drinking water
drinking-water.heroDesc: Drinking water quality standard in developed countries. 95% of water in Europe is treated with ozone.
drinking-water.content:
Drinking water ozonation is the quality standard in developed countries. Ozone destroys all types of pathogens: bacteria, viruses, spores and cysts with up to 99.99% efficiency. Unlike chlorination, it does not form carcinogenic trihalomethanes.

Given the hazards of chlorination byproducts (halogenated compounds), alternative disinfection methods are preferred. Ozone is officially recommended as a safer alternative.

Ozonation improves water organoleptic properties: removes unpleasant taste and odor, improves color. Residual ozone decays to oxygen in 20–30 minutes, leaving no chemical traces.

Recommended residual ozone in drinking water is 0.1–0.3 mg/L. Treatment is effective at any pH found in natural waters.

content.intro1: Ичимлик сувини озоңлаш ривожланган мамлакатларда сифат стандартидир. Озон барча турдаги патогенларни йўқ қилади: бактериялар, вируслар, споралар ва протозоонлар цистлари 99.99% самарадорлик билан. Хлорлашдан фарқли ўлароқ, озон канцероген тригалометанлар ва бошқа хавфли ён маҳсулотларни ҳосил қилмайди.
content.intro2: Озон сувни тайёрлашда қўлланиладиган энг кучли оксидловчидир. Бактерицид таъсири бўйича хлорни 3000 марта ошади, қолган озон эса 20-30 дақиқада кислородга парчаланади ва сувда кимёвий из қолдирмайди.

regulation.label: Ичимлик суви стандартлари:
regulation.text: Хлорлаш ён маҳсулотларининг (галогенли бирикмалар) хавфини ҳисобга олган ҳолда, алтернатив дезинфекция усулларига устуворлик берилиши керак. Озон хавфсизроқ алтернатива сифатида расман тавсия этилади.

wastewater.title: Wastewater
wastewater.shortDesc: Deep treatment and disinfection of effluents
wastewater.heroDesc: Deep treatment and disinfection of effluents without toxic byproducts
wastewater.content:
Wastewater ozonation provides deep treatment of organic pollutants, pathogens and odors. The method is used as a final treatment stage before discharge to water bodies or reuse.

Ozone is a strong oxidizer that effectively breaks down complex organic compounds, including phenols, oil products and surfactants. Oxidation converts soluble pollutants to insoluble forms for subsequent filtration.

Advantage over chlorination: ozone does not form toxic chlorinated organics that harm aquatic ecosystems. After treatment, water is safe for discharge without long dechlorination.

The method is especially effective in oil-bearing regions where water contains high organic loads and color. Ozone removes color and odors, improving treated water quality.

intro.paragraph1: Чиқинди сувларни озоңлаш — сув ҳавзаларига чиқариш ёки сувни қайта ишлатишдан олдин якуний босқич сифатида қўлланиладиган чуқур тозалашнинг замонавий усули. Озон — мураккаб органик бирикмаларни самарали парчалайдиган кучли оксидловчи бўлиб, токсик хлорорганик бирикмаларни ҳосил қилмасдан дезинфекцияни таъминлайди.
intro.paragraph2: Усул феноллар, нефт маҳсулотлари, сирт фаол моддалар (SAS), пестицидлар ва бошқа қийин оксидланадиган органик бирикмаларни ўз ичига олган саноат чиқиндиларини тозалаш учун айниқса самарали. Озоңлашдан кейин сув узоқ дехлорингизсиз сув ҳавзаларига чиқариш учун хавфсиз.

ecologicalAdvantage.label: Экологик афзаллик:
ecologicalAdvantage.text: Хлорлашдан фарқли ўлароқ, озон сув экотизимлари учун хавфли бўлган токсик хлорорганик бирикмаларни ҳосил қилмайди. Қайта ишлашдан кейин озон кислородга парчаланади ва сувни қўшимча равишда аэратсия қилади.

pools-spa.title: Бассейнлар ва SPA
pools-spa.shortDesc: Хлор ҳидисиз ва қичишишсиз тоза сув
pools-spa.heroDesc: Хлор ҳидисиз кристал тоза сув. Узоқ вақт сувда бўлишда ҳам кўз ва тери қичишиши йўқ.
pools-spa.content:
Бассейн сувини озоңлаш - хлор ҳиди ёки кўз ва шиллиқ pardalar қичишиши бўлмасдан eng юқори сифатли сув олиш учун замонавий усул.

Озон ҳам оксидловчи, ҳам дезинфекция воситаси сифатида ишлайди. У бактериялар, вируслар ва спораларга қарши хлордан самаралироқ бўлиб, микроалг ва протозоонларнинг қалин қобиғини бузади. Сув ёқимли кўк рангга эга бўлади.

Бассейнлар учун tavsiya этилган озон дозаси - айланиш суви учун 0,7-0,9 g/m³. Контакт идишида контакт вақти - 6-7 дақиқа. Филтр чиқишидаги қолган озон 0,1 mg/L дан ошмайди.

Озонни хлор билан биргаликда ишлатганда, одатдаги 0,7 mg/L ўрнига хлорни 0,1 mg/L darajasida сақлаш мумкин. Бу тери ва кўз қичишишини деярли бартараф этади ва узоқ муддатли дезинфекцияни таъминлайди.

content.intro1: Бассейнларни хлорлаш - анъанавий дезинфекция усули, лекин у муҳим камчиликларни ўз ичига олади: кучли хлор ҳиди, кўз ва шиллиқ pardalar қичишиши, қуруқ тери, соч ва сузиш кийимларининг рангсизланиши. Озоңлаш бу muammolarni деярли бартараф этиб, eng юқори сифатли сув олиш имконини беради.
content.intro2: Озон - eng кучли оксидловчи, бактерицид таъсири бўйича хлорни 3000 марта ошади. У бактериялар, вируслар, споралар ва протозоонларни йўқ қилади, микроалг ҳужайра деворларини бузади. Сув ёқимли кўк рангга эга бўлади.

regulation.text: Озоңлаш бассейн сувини дезинфекция қилишнинг замонавий усули сифатида tavsiya этилади, бу хлор концентратсиясини минимал зарур даражага камайтириш имконини беради.

iron-removal.title: Iron and manganese removal
iron-removal.shortDesc: Iron and manganese removal from water
iron-removal.heroTitle: Iron and manganese removal by ozonation
iron-removal.heroDesc: Iron and manganese removal by ozonation — effective for difficult cases with organic metal complexes
iron-removal.content:
Iron and manganese are the most common metallic impurities in natural water. Ozonation is an effective removal method, especially when metals are present as organic complexes.

Standard iron removal methods (aeration, lime, cation exchange) are ineffective with organic compounds. Ozone oxidizes complexes, causing iron and manganese to precipitate for subsequent filtration.

Required ozone dose: about 1 mg per 1 mg iron and 4 mg per 1 mg manganese. Oxidation is effective at any pH of natural waters. Ozone converts Fe²⁺ to Fe³⁺, which forms solid Fe(OH)₃ precipitate, easily removed by filtration.

The technology includes ozonation in a contact tank followed by mechanical and carbon filtration. For high manganese, double ozonation is used for complete metal precipitation.
benefits: Oxidation of iron and manganese to precipitate

intro.paragraph1: Iron and manganese are the most common metallic impurities in natural water, and they are usually present together. Although iron is not toxic, its presence in water leads to deterioration of organoleptic and taste properties, appearance of brown sediment on surfaces in contact with water. Manganese belongs to the category of hazardous substances.
intro.paragraph2: Ozonation is especially effective when iron and manganese are present in water as organic complex compounds. Standard iron removal methods (aeration, liming, cation exchange) are ineffective in this case. Ozone oxidizes complex compounds, causing metals to precipitate in insoluble forms.
intro.regulationText: Maximum permissible concentration (MPC) of iron in drinking water is 0.3 mg/L, manganese — 0.1 mg/L. Exceeding these limits makes water unsuitable for drinking water supply and technological needs.

ironChemistry.title: Iron oxidation chemistry with ozone
ironChemistry.description: Ozone oxidizes Fe²⁺ to Fe³⁺, which forms insoluble iron hydroxide Fe(OH)₃, easily removed by filtration. The reaction proceeds at pH from 6 to 9.

manganeseChemistry.title: Manganese oxidation chemistry with ozone
manganeseChemistry.description: Ozone oxidizes Mn²⁺ to Mn⁴⁺, which forms insoluble manganese dioxide MnO₂. At pH around 8, the reaction proceeds most effectively.
manganeseChemistry.importantText: With excess ozone, further oxidation of manganese to Mn⁷⁺ with formation of soluble permanganate MnO₄⁻ (pink water color) is possible. In the presence of organic compounds, permanganate decomposes to MnO₂. For high manganese concentrations, double ozonation is used.

steps.title: Source water supply
steps.description: Water with elevated iron and manganese content is fed into the contact tank. Pre-filtration from coarse impurities.

steps.title: Ozone generation
steps.description: Atmospheric air is cleaned by filter, fed into oxygen concentrator (85-95% O₂), then into ozone generator.

steps.title: Ozonation in contact chamber
steps.description: Bubbling ozone-air mixture through water layer or injection through Venturi ejector. Contact time: 5-15 minutes.

steps.title: Precipitation of oxidized metals
steps.description: Fe(OH)₃ and MnO₂ precipitate in the contact tank. Periodic tank flushing to remove sediment.

steps.title: Mechanical filtration
steps.description: Removal of suspended particles of oxidized metals through sand filter. Pore size: 10-50 μm.

steps.title: Carbon filtration
steps.description: Final treatment through activated carbon to remove residual ozone and improve organoleptic properties.

doubleOzonation.title: Double ozonation (for high Mn concentrations)
doubleOzonation.paragraph: At manganese content above 0.5 mg/L, double ozonation scheme may be required: primary ozonation of source water, filtration, then secondary ozonation of filtrate. This prevents formation of soluble permanganate.

organicComplexes.title: Organic complex problems
organicComplexes.paragraph: In oil-bearing regions where water contains large amounts of organic impurities, iron and manganese are often present as organic complex compounds. This makes standard iron removal methods ineffective.
items: Aeration doesn't work: organic complexes are not oxidized by air oxygen
Liming is ineffective: complex compounds do not precipitate when pH is raised
Cation exchange is difficult: organic complexes do not exchange on ion exchange resins
Ozone solves the problem: breaks down organic complexes, releasing metals for precipitation
organicComplexes.advantageText: Metal oxidation with ozone proceeds effectively at any pH values found in natural waters (6-9), while manganese oxidation with air oxygen requires pH > 10.

systemParams.title: Recommended system parameters
systemParams.noteText: Ozonator power is calculated for water with Fe content up to 10 mg/L and Mn up to 1 mg/L. For higher concentrations, individual calculation is required.

benefits.title: Benefits of ozonation for iron removal

items.title: Versatility
items.description: Effectively removes iron and manganese of any forms, including organic complexes.

items.title: Wide pH range
items.description: Works at pH 6-9 without need for water acidity correction.

items.title: Complex action
items.description: Simultaneously disinfects water, removes color, odors, oxidizes H₂S.

items.title: No reagents
items.description: Ozone is produced on-site from air. No need to purchase and store chemicals.
